contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox MLB player |name=José Escobar |position=[[Infielder]] |image= |bats=Right |throws=Right |birth_date={{Birth date and age|1960|10|30}} |birth_place=[[Yaracuy State|Las Flores, Yaracuy State]], [[Venezuela]] |debutdate=April 13 |debutyear=1991 |debutteam=Cleveland Indians |finaldate=May 11 |finalyear=1991 |finalteam=Cleveland Indians |stat1label=[[Batting average]] |stat1value=.200 |stat2label=[[Home run]]s |stat2value=0 |stat3label=[[Run batted in|Runs batted in]] |stat3value=1 |teams=<nowiki></nowiki> *[[Cleveland Indians]] ({{by|1991}}) }} '''José Elías Escobar Sánchez''' (born October 30, 1960) is a former [[Major League Baseball]] [[shortstop]] and right-handed batter who played for the [[Cleveland Indians]] (1991). Escobar hit .200 (3-for-15) with one [[run batted in]] in 10 games. ==See also== * [[List of players from Venezuela in Major League Baseball]] ==External links== * [http://www.baseball-reference.com/e/escobjo01.shtml Career statistics at ''Baseball Reference''] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Escobar, Jose | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Baseball player | DATE OF BIRTH = October 30, 1960 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Yaracuy State|Las Flores, Yaracuy State]], [[Venezuela]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Escobar, Jose}} [[Category:Cleveland Indians players]] [[Category:Syracuse Chiefs players]] [[Category:Kinston Indians players]] [[Category:Canton-Akron Indians players]] [[Category:Major League Baseball shortstops]] [[Category:Major League Baseball players from Venezuela]] [[Category:People from Yaracuy]] [[Category:1960 births]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Venezuela-baseball-shortstop-stub}}
